name: gameEventId
description: A unique identifier for game events.

name: possessionEventId
description: A unique identifier for possession events.

name: startTime
description: Time the possession starts in seconds. (In reference to the start of the video, not the game)

name: endTime
description: Time the possession ends in seconds. (In reference to the start of the video, not the game)

name: duration
description: Duration of the possession in seconds.

name: eventTime
description: Time in seconds when the event took place. In reference to the start of the video

name: gameEvents
description: Dictionary variable containing information regarding the game events.

fields.name: gameEventType
fields.description: Type of game event.

fields.name: initialNonEvent
fields.description: Was the possession disallowed after the fact?

fields.name: startGameClock
fields.description: Time the possession starts in second in reference to the start of the game

fields.name: startFormattedGameClock
fields.description: Time the possession starts in the "00:00" format.

fields.name: period
fields.description: The period (or half) the event took place.

fields.name: videoMissing
fields.description: Is part of the event cut by the broadcast?

fields.name: teamId
fields.description: A unique identifier for the team

fields.name: teamName
fields.description: Name of the team

fields.name: playerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player in possession.

fields.name: playerName
fields.description: Name of the player in possession

fields.name: touches
fields.description: Total number of separate touches a player takes within their possession.

fields.name: touchesInBox
fields.description: Number of touches in the opposition box a player takes within their possession.

fields.name: setpieceType
fields.description: Type of set piece being taken or type O when not a set piece

fields.name: earlyDistribution
fields.description: Is the set piece taken quickly?

fields.name: videoUrl
fields.description: Link to video for the specific possession

fields.name: endType
fields.description: Indicates the type of end event.

fields.name: outType
fields.description: Indicates why the ball has gone out of play

fields.name: subType
fields.description: Type of substitution

fields.name: playerOffId
fields.description: Unique Identifier for the player coming off the pitch

fields.name: playerOffName
fields.description: Name of the player coming off the pitch

fields.name: playerOffType
fields.description: Reason for the player leaving the pitch

fields.name: playerOnId
fields.description: Unique Identifier for the player coming on the pitch

fields.name: playerOnName
fields.description: Name of the player coming on the pitch

name: initialTouch
description: Dictionary variable containing information regarding a player's first touch.

fields.name: initialBodyType
fields.description: The Body part used to take the first touch

fields.name: initialHeightType
fields.description: Height from where the ball was received.

fields.name: facingType
fields.description: Direction the player is facing at the point of reception.

fields.name: initialTouchType
fields.description: Quality and difficulty when controlling the ball

fields.name: initialPressureType
fields.description: Type of pressure being applied

fields.name: initialPressurePlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player applying the pressure

fields.name: initialPressurePlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player applying the pressure.

name: possessionEvents
description: Dictionary variable containing information regarding the possession events.

fields.name: possessionEventType
fields.description: Type of event.

fields.name: nonEvent
fields.description: Is the event disallowed after the fact?

fields.name: gameClock
fields.description: Time in seconds when the event took place. In reference to the start of the game

fields.name: formattedGameClock
fields.description: Time when the event took place in the "00:00" format.

fields.name: eventVideoUrl
fields.description: Link to the video for the specific event.

fields.name: ballHeightType
fields.description: Height from where the ball was played.

fields.name: bodyType
fields.description: Body part used to hit the ball

fields.name: highPointType
fields.description: Maximum height the ball reached from the point of the distribution and the next event (or the next bounce)

fields.name: passerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player passing the ball.

fields.name: passerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player passing the ball

fields.name: passType
fields.description: Type of pass played. We chart the intention of the pass

fields.name: passOutcomeType
fields.description: The outcome of the pass.

fields.name: crosserPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the crosser player.

fields.name: crosserPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player crossing the ball

fields.name: crossType
fields.description: Type of cross. We chart intention

fields.name: crossZoneType
fields.description: Where the cross was intended to go. Since we chart intention

fields.name: crossOutcomeType
fields.description: The outcome of the cross.

fields.name: targetPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the intended target of the pass or cross.

fields.name: targetPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player being targeted by the pass or cross

fields.name: targetFacingType
fields.description: The direction the target is facing at the point of the pass. (Not applicable to crosses).

fields.name: receiverPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the teammate receiving the pass or cross. (Only applicable to completed passes)

fields.name: receiverPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player receiving the ball

fields.name: receiverFacingType
fields.description: The direction the receiver is facing at the point the pass is played. (Note that if the target is the same as the receiver, those data points will be the same.)

fields.name: defenderPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identified for the defender when the outcome of the pass is "D defensive interception"

fields.name: defenderPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the defender who ends up with the ball as a result of an incomplete pass

fields.name: blockerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the defender when the outcome of the pass is "B Blocked". This variable also applies to clearance and shots that are blocked.

fields.name: blockerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player that blocks the distribution. This variable also applies to clearance and shots that are blocked.

fields.name: deflectorPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who deflects the ball. A deflection will be a lighter touch that will cause only a slight redirection. This variable also applies to shots, and if a light touch takes the ball off target or the goal is given as an own goal that is considered a block rather than a deflection on a shot.

fields.name: deflectorPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player deflecting the ball. This variable also applies to shots and clearances.

fields.name: failedBlockerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who attempts a block and fails. This variable also applies to shots and clearances.

fields.name: failedBlockerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who attempts a block and fails. This variable also applies to shots and clearances.

fields.name: failedBlocker2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who attempts a block and fails. This variable also applies to shots and clearances.

fields.name: failedBlocker2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who attempts a block and fails. This variable also applies to shots and clearances.

fields.name: failedBlocker3PlayerId
fields.description: If there are more than one block attempts failed, those are going to be recorded as the failedBlocker2PlayerId, failedblocker3PlayerId, and so on.

fields.name: failedBlocker3PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the additional failed blocker, similar to above if we have more if we have more failed blockers it will be charted as failedBlocker4PlayerName, and so on

fields.name: accuracyType
fields.description: Accuracy of the pass. Exclusive for completed passes.

fields.name: incompletionReasonType
fields.description: The reason the pass was incomplete.

fields.name: secondIncompletionReasonType
fields.description: We can add up to two reasons for incompletion, so this will be the secondary reason.

fields.name: linesBrokenType
fields.description: Line of defense broken by the pass. Also applicable for ball carries and dribbles where a player breaks a line of defense.

fields.name: shooterPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player trying to score

fields.name: shooterPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player shooting the ball.

fields.name: bodyMovementType
fields.description: The direction the shooter is moving as they take the shot.

fields.name: ballMoving
fields.description: Is the ball moving as the player takes the shot?

fields.name: shotType
fields.description: Type of shot attempted.

fields.name: shotNatureType
fields.description: The nature of the shot indicates how the player tries to score

fields.name: shotInitialHeightType
fields.description: The height where the goal crosses the goalline or would have crossed the goal line if not saved or blocked. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: shotOutcomeType
fields.description: The outcome of the shot. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: keeperPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player trying to the goalkeeper trying to save the shot. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: keeperPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the goalkeeper trying to save the shot. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: saveHeightType
fields.description: Height of the ball at the point of the save. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: saveReboundType
fields.description: The direction the ball goes after being saved from the perspective of the shooter. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: keeperTouchType
fields.description: Body part with which the goal keeper touched the ball. Only used if the keeper touched the ball but it still ended up as a goal, or required a goalline clearance. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: glClearerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player responsible for the goalline clearance (Only applicable for shotOutcomeType "L - Goalline clearance". This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: glClearerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player responsible for the goalline clearance. This applies to events with outcome "Inadvertent Shot at Goal/Own Goal".

fields.name: badParry
fields.description: Does the goalkeeper have the opportunity to do better with their parry?

fields.name: saveable
fields.description: Did the keeper have a chance to save the shot that ended up in a goal or goalline clearance?

fields.name: clearerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player clearing the ball.

fields.name: clearerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player clearing the ball

fields.name: clearanceOutcomeType
fields.description: Outcome of the clearance

fields.name: carrierPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player in control of the ball.

fields.name: carrierPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player in control of the ball

fields.name: dribblerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player trying to take on a defender.

fields.name: dribblerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player trying to take on a defender

fields.name: challengeType
fields.description: Type of Challenge

fields.name: dribbleType
fields.description: Type of dribble attempted, as the name suggests, only applicable for dribbles.

fields.name: tackleAttemptType
fields.description: Within a dribble the challenger may or may not attempt a tackle. The tackle type is captured here. Only applicable to dribbles.

fields.name: trickType
fields.description: Type of type attempted, only applicable to dribbles with dribbleType - Trick.

fields.name: challengerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the primary challenger attempting a tackle, or being taken on by a dribble

fields.name: challengerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the primary challenger attempting a tackle, or being taken on by a dribble

fields.name: challenger2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the secondary challenger attempting a tackle, or being taken on by a dribble

fields.name: challenger2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the secondary challenger attempting a tackle, or being taken on by a dribble

fields.name: homeDuelPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player on the home team primarily involved in a duel.

fields.name: homeDuelPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player on the home team primarily involved in a duel.

fields.name: awayDuelPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player on the away team primarily involved in a duel.

fields.name: awayDuelPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player on the away team primarily involved in a duel.

fields.name: additionalDuelerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the additional player involved in the duel.

fields.name: additionalDuelerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the additional player involved in the duel.

fields.name: additionalDueler2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the additional player involved in the duel.

fields.name: additionalDueler2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the additional player involved in the duel.

fields.name: challengeKeeperPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the goalkeeper involved in challenges of Type "G- Goalkeeper Smothers" or "H - Handtackle"

fields.name: challengeKeeperPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the goalkeeper involved in challenges of Type "G Goalkeeper Smothers" or "H- Handtackle"

fields.name: challengeWinnerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who wins the challenge*

fields.name: challengeWinnerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who wins the challenge*

fields.name: challengeOutcomeType
fields.description: Outcome of the challenge, some outcomes are only used in dribbles and some are not used in duels.

fields.name: ballCarrierPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player in control of the ball. Also applicable to touch and ball carries, but NOT applicable to duels.

fields.name: ballCarrierPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player in control of the ball

fields.name: touchPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who touched the ball.

fields.name: touchPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who touched the ball.

fields.name: carryType
fields.description: Type of action that describes the ball carry.

fields.name: ballCarryOutcome
fields.description: Outcome of the ball carry attempted.

fields.name: carryDefenderPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player trying to defend the carry.

fields.name: carryDefenderPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player defending the carry.

fields.name: carryIntent
fields.description: What the ball carriers intends to accomplish on the carry

fields.name: carrySuccessful
fields.description: Did the player successfully accomplish what they intended to do?

fields.name: touchType
fields.description: Touch encompasses a variety of events which are defined by the type of touch.

fields.name: touchOutcomeType
fields.description: The outcome of a touch event.

fields.name: rebounderPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player the ball hits.

fields.name: rebounderPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player the ball hits.

fields.name: originateType
fields.description: Where the ball comes from leading to the rebound.

fields.name: reboundOutcomeType
fields.description: Outcome of the rebound

fields.name: missedTouchType
fields.description: Similar to touch events, missed touches do not get a game event as the player fails to make contact with the ball, instead a missed touch will be captured within the previous event.

fields.name: missedTouchPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who missed the ball.

fields.name: missedTouchPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who misses the ball.

fields.name: pressureType
fields.description: Type of pressure being applied. Same options as the initial touch pressure, but referring to a pressure on the event instead.

fields.name: pressurePlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who pressured the player in possession.

fields.name: pressurePlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who pressure the player in possession

fields.name: opportunityType
fields.description: Type of opportunity an event generates for their team or the opposing team.

fields.name: betterOptionType
fields.description: We would chart a better option if a player missed an opportunity to do something better with their possession. This captures the type of better Option

fields.name: betterOptionTime
fields.description: Time in seconds in reference to the start of the video (not the game) where the opportunity presented itself.

fields.name: betterOptionPlayerId
fields.description: This is the unique identifier for the target of the pass, cross or takeover (ball carry). One scenario which is different is if there is a dummy and the better option would be for the target not to dummy it, in that case this data point refers to the player who attempted the dummy

fields.name: betterOptionPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the better option player as described above.

fields.name: createsSpace
fields.description: Did the player in possession attempt to create space prior to a distribution (even if unsuccessful)?

fields.name: csPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who created space.

fields.name: csPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who created space.

fields.name: csGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player who created space.

fields.name: positionPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position3PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: positionPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position3PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position4PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position4PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position5PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: position5PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a positional grade.

fields.name: closingDownPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a closing down grade.

fields.name: closingDownPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a closing down grade.

fields.name: closingDown2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a closing down grade.

fields.name: closingDown2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a closing down grade.

fields.name: movementPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a movement grade.

fields.name: movementPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a movement grade.

fields.name: dabPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a DAB (defending away from the ball) grade.

fields.name: dabPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a DAB (defending away from the ball) grade.

fields.name: dab2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a second player who will receive a DAB (defending away from the ball) grade.

fields.name: dab2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the second player who will receive a DAB (defending away from the ball) grade.

fields.name: failedClearerPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who failed to clear the ball.

fields.name: failedClearerPlayerName
fields.description: Name of a player who failed to clear the ball.

fields.name: failedShooterPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who failed to shoot the ball.

fields.name: failedShooterPlayerName
fields.description: Name of a player who failed to shoot the ball.

fields.name: movement2PlayerId
fields.description: Grade given for an off the ball movement by a teammate.

fields.name: movement2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a movement grade.

fields.name: movement3PlayerId
fields.description: Grade given for an off the ball movement by a teammate.

fields.name: movement3PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a movement grade.

fields.name: disciplinePlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a discipline grade.

fields.name: disciplinePlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a discipline grade.

fields.name: discipline2PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who will receive a discipline grade.

fields.name: discipline2PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who will receive a discipline grade.

fields.name: discipline3PlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a third player who will receive a discipline grade.

fields.name: discipline3PlayerName
fields.description: Name of the third player who will receive a discipline grade.

fields.name: failedPasserPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who failed to pass the ball.

fields.name: failedPasserPlayerName
fields.description: Name of a player who failed to pass the ball.

fields.name: failedCrosserPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for a player who failed to cross the ball.

fields.name: failedCrosserPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who failed to cross the ball.

name: fouls
description: Dictionary variable containing information regarding fouls.

fields.name: onFieldCulpritPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who committed the foul, as per the referee's initial decision.

fields.name: onFieldCulpritPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who committed the foul, as per the referee's initial decision.

fields.name: finalCulpritPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who committed the foul, as per the referee's final decision, usually the same unless var is used for a card that is given to the wrong player.

fields.name: finalCulpritPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who committed the foul, as per the referee's final decision, usually the same unless var is used for a card that is given to the wrong player.

fields.name: victimPlayerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player who is the victim of the foul.

fields.name: victimPlayerName
fields.description: Name of the player who is the victim of the foul

fields.name: foulType
fields.description: Foul type defines if a foul is given, missed or an advantage is played.

fields.name: onFieldOffenseType
fields.description: Unique identifier for the offense type. The onFieldOffenseType represents the initial decision

fields.name: finalOffenseType
fields.description: Unique identifier for the offense type. The final OffenseType the final decision, those are usually the same even when VAR is True.

fields.name: onFieldFoulOutcomeType
fields.description: The outcome of the foul, similarly to the other data points the on field and final outcome will be the same unless VAR is used.

fields.name: finalFoulOutcomeType
fields.description: The outcome of the foul, similarly to the other data points the on field and final outcome will be the same unless VAR is used.

fields.name: var
fields.description: Was VAR used on the play? VAR is technically used in the background in many scenarios, like offsides, goals, possible penalties, so we only select "True" when the referee needs to go to the screen or the initial decision is overturned.

fields.name: varReasonType
fields.description: The reason VAR was used.

fields.name: correctDecision
fields.description: Was the final decision correct?

name: grades
description: Dictionary variable containing the player grades.

fields.name: additionalDuelerGrade
fields.description: Grade corresponding to the additionalDuelerPlayerId.

fields.name: additionalDueler2Grade
fields.description: Grade corresponding to the additionalDueler2PlayerId.

fields.name: awayDuelGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the primary player from the away team involved in a duel, which would correspond to the away DuelerPlayerId.

fields.name: ballCarrierGrade
fields.description: Grade corresponding to the ballCarrierPlayerId. Only on Ball Carries.

fields.name: blockerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player blocking a distribution, corresponding to the blockerPlayerId.

fields.name: carrierGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player to the player in control of the ball on a tackle. Corresponding to the ballCarrierPlayerId.

fields.name: carryDefenderGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player defending a carry, which corresponds to the carry DefenderPlayerId.

fields.name: challengerGrade
fields.description: Grade corresponding to the challengerPlayerId.

fields.name: challenger2Grade
fields.description: Grade corresponding to the challenger2PlayerId.

fields.name: challengeKeeperGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a goalkeeper on a goalkeeper smothers or hand tackle, which corresponds to challenge Keeper PlayerId.

fields.name: clearerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player clearing the ball, which corresponds to the clearerPlayerId.

fields.name: glClearerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player responsible for a goalline clearance, which will correspond to the glClearerPlayerId.

fields.name: closingDownGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player for their attempt (or lack thereof) to close down on the player in possession.

fields.name: closingDown2Grade
fields.description: Grade given to the player for their attempt (or lack thereof) to close down on the player in possession.

fields.name: crosserGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the crosser, which corresponds to the crosse PlayerId

fields.name: csGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player who created space.

fields.name: dabGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a player who will receive a DAB (defending away from the ball) grade.

fields.name: dab2Grade
fields.description: Grade given to a second player who will receive a DAB (defending away from the ball) grade.

fields.name: defenderGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the defender that gets the ball on an incomplete pass or cross, which corresponds to the defenderPlayerId.

fields.name: deflectorGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player who deflects a distribution, which corresponds to the deflectorPlayerId.

fields.name: disciplineGrade
fields.description: Grade (usually downgrade) given for discipline.

fields.name: discipline2Grade
fields.description: Grade (usually downgrade) given for discipline.

fields.name: discipline3Grade
fields.description: Grade (usually downgrade) given for discipline.

fields.name: dribblerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player trying to dribble past a defender, this will correspond to the ballCarrierPlayerId.

fields.name: failedBlockerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player attempting to block a distribution and failing.

fields.name: failedBlocker2Grade
fields.description: Grade given to the player attempting to block a distribution and failing.

fields.name: failedBlocker3Grade
fields.description: Grade given to the player attempting to block a distribution and failing.

fields.name: failedClearerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a player who failed to clear the ball.

fields.name: failedCrosserGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a player who failed to cross the ball.

fields.name: failedPasserGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a player who failed to pass the ball.

fields.name: failedShooterGrade
fields.description: Grade given for a player who failed to shoot the ball.

fields.name: homeDuelGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the primary player from the home team involved in a duel, which would correspond to the homeDuelerPlayerId

fields.name: keeperGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a keeper for their effort to save a shot or inadvertent shot, which would correspond to the keeperPlayerId.

fields.name: movementGrade
fields.description: Grade given for an off the ball movement by a teammate.

fields.name: movement2Grade
fields.description: Grade given for an off the ball movement by a teammate.

fields.name: movement3Grade
fields.description: Grade given for an off the ball movement by a teammate.

fields.name: passerGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player passing the ball, which will correspond to the passerPlayerld.

fields.name: positionGrade
fields.description: Grade given to a defensive player for their positioning.

fields.name: position2Grade
fields.description: Grade given to a defensive player for their positioning.

fields.name: position3Grade
fields.description: Grade given to a defensive player for their positioning.

fields.name: position4Grade
fields.description: Grade given to the player responsible for a positional value, which will correspond to the position4PlayerId.

fields.name: position5Grade
fields.description: Grade given to the player responsible for a positional value, which will correspond to the position5PlayerId.

fields.name: receiverGrade
fields.description: A receiver grade will be the same as a movement grade, but specific to the recipient of a pass or cross. The grade will correspond to the receiver PlayerId.

fields.name: shooterGrade
fields.description: Grade given to the player attempting to score, which will correspond to the shooterPlayerId.

fields.name: targetGrade
fields.description: A target grade will be the same as a movement grade, but specific to the target of a pass. The grade will correspond to the targetPlayerId.

fields.name: touchGrade
fields.description: A touch grade will be given to the player on a touch event with the exception of failed passes/crosses/shots/clearances as that is covered by the failed Passer/Crosser/Shooter/Clearer grades above. This grade will correspond to the ballCarrierPlayerId.

name: homePlayers
description: List of dictionary variables containing information regarding the broadcast tracking data for the players on the home team.

fields.name: jerseyNum
fields.description: Number of the Jersey of the player in question.

fields.name: confidence
fields.description: Confidence level of the tracking data.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: Visibility status of the player.

fields.name: x
fields.description: Player's x coordinate

fields.name: y
fields.description: Player's y coordinate

fields.name: speed
fields.description: Player's speed

fields.name: playerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player

name: awayPlayers
description: List of dictionary variables containing information regarding the broadcast tracking data for the players on the away team.

fields.name: jerseyNum
fields.description: Number of the Jersey of the player in question.

fields.name: confidence
fields.description: Confidence level of the tracking data.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: Visibility status of the player.

fields.name: x
fields.description: Player's x coordinate

fields.name: y
fields.description: Player's y coordinate

fields.name: speed
fields.description: Player's speed

fields.name: playerId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the player

name: ball
description: Dictionary variable containing information regarding the broadcast tracking data for the ball.

fields.name: visibility
fields.description: This data point describes whether the location of the ball is estimated or visible.

fields.name: x
fields.description: Ball's x coordinate

fields.name: y
fields.description: Ball's y coordinate

fields.name: z
fields.description: Ball's z coordinate
